title: Modern Mangalsutra Necklace with Diamond Accents
features: Delicate rose gold chain adorned with interspersed black beads and round pendants encrusted with shimmering CZ stones. The design offers a modern interpretation of the traditional Mangalsutra, making it suitable for everyday wear. The pendants feature a halo setting around the CZ's.
occasions: Modern Indian weddings (as a lighter alternative to heavy necklaces)
description: A contemporary and elegant take on the traditional Mangalsutra. The lightweight design ensures comfortable daily wear, while the CZ stones add a touch of sparkle. A perfect blend of tradition and modernity, ideal for the modern Indian woman.
